layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x110
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x110
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x79
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 226x18
          text run at (0,0) width 226: "There should be a green bar below:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (15,34) size 195x45 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 195x30 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 30x15
            text run at (0,0) width 30: "x "
          LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 150x30
            LayoutText {#text} at (90,0) size 150x30
              text run at (90,0) width 60: "xxxx"
              text run at (0,15) width 60: "xxxx"
          LayoutText {#text} at (60,15) size 30x15
            text run at (60,15) width 30: " x"
